application_details.scheme_name: Erection of an outbuilding for use incidental to the house

decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: DWG01 - Location, DWG02 - Proposed Block DWG03, Existing Block DWG04, Proposed Floor and Roof Plan, DWG05 - Proposed Elevations.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the outbuilding hereby approved shall be as specified in approved drawing DWG05.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B; London Plan (2021) policy D3; and National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for a home office or other domestic purposes incidental to the ground floor flat on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as home office
